description: expressJS API to create a reverser proxy for `sunbird.org`

folderPath.description: path to the folder where the git repository is to be initialised

initializeGitRepository.description: Initialises a github repo at the specified path

remoteUrl.description: remote URL that needs to be added to the git repository

addRemoteToGitRepository.description: add a remote with specified name and url to the github repo path
